fullText:
Merciless Brigand

Type: Racial
Campaign Setting: General
Prerequisite: Mul

Freedom is sweet, but surviving is sweeter. You fled into the wilds and lived as a bandit for a time. Were you a loner or were you part of an outlaw band? Why did you choose this path instead of honest work? Your new life as an adventurer suggests you broke with this career. What made you change?
    Associated Skills: Intimidate, Stealth

Published in Dragon Magazine 391.

');
flavor: Freedom is sweet, but surviving is sweeter. You fled into the wilds and lived as a bandit for a time. Were you a loner or were you part of an outlaw band? Why did you choose this path instead of honest work? Your new life as an adventurer suggests you broke with this career. What made you change?
name: Merciless Brigand
